content: The difficulty level in tutorials could cover each topic starting from the easy level that it does to something harder. It doesn't really prepare me for the "Challenges," a type of exercise for which I have to wait. Also, if you're struggling with limited system resources, try uninstalling the largest apps. Also, it should be not possible to guess the answer by matching the length of the answer with the length of the slot in the question.
